author: misilva73
content: Does anyone know if https://eips.ethereum.org/ renders jupyter notebooks? I.e., if I add a jupyter notebook to the assets and someone clicks on it from the EIP page, what do people see? The raw file?

author: raxhvl
content: Browsers cannot render a jupyter notebook link, and so it shows a raw file.

author: raxhvl
content: Do you want it to be interactive or just render the contents?

author: raxhvl
content:
If you don't want it to be interactive, then you could upload the notebook to assets. Then go to github url notebook in the assets folder and use that link in your EIP. 

for example: https://github.com/misilva73/evm-gas-repricings/blob/main/notebooks/0.1-eest_benchmarks_eda.ipynb

author: raxhvl
content: Sharing an interactive link is more involved, [you can follow the steps here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=owSGVOov9pQ) to create a link for that.
